control.name: Chart

property.name: Name
property.helpHtml: Name that can be given to the control. Names are used to help identify controls uniquely.

property.name: Type
property.helpHtml: Sets the chart type from line to bar or pie.

property.name: Left
property.helpHtml: A number or percentage for how far from the left the chart is within the chart area.

property.name: Top
property.helpHtml: A number or percentage for how far from the top the chart is within the chart area.

property.name: Width
property.helpHtml: A number or percentage of the width of the chart relative to the available chart area.

property.name: Height
property.helpHtml: A number or percentage of the height of the chart relative to the available chart area.

property.name: Colours
property.helpHtml: A comma separated list of colours to use for the chart elements.

property.name: Legend position
property.helpHtml: The position of the legend or key within the chart area.

property.name: Legend alignment
property.helpHtml: The alignment of the legend or key to be used at its position.

property.name: Curve lines
property.helpHtml: Whether to smooth the lines by curving them.

property.name: Stacked
property.helpHtml: Stacks multiple series into the same column.

property.name: Pie slice text
property.helpHtml: The content of the text displayed on each pie slice.

property.name: Other threshold
property.helpHtml: The percentage value below which pie slices will be combined into an "Other" slice.

property.name: 3D
property.helpHtml: Draws the pie chart in 3 dimensions.

property.name: Pie hole ratio
property.helpHtml: A percentage between 0 (no hole) and 99 (greatest hole). Other values are ignored and it does not work with 3D.

control.getDetailsFunction: var details = { name: this.name, chartType: this.chartType, left: this.left, top: this.top, width: this.width, height: this.height, colours: this.colours, legendPosition: this.legendPosition, legendAlignment: this.legendAlignment, isStacked: this.isStacked, curveType: this.curveType, pieSliceText: this.pieSliceText, sliceVisibilityThreshold: this.sliceVisibilityThreshold, is3D: this.is3D, pieHole: this.pieHole }; window[this.id + "details"] = details; return details;
